name: Click&Jam
description:
Please play this game in widescreen. 
(Use Headphones !)

Game made for the CWC Game Jam with effraie.ofc (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCipsDIFG3-UdVTAFR3_Ocdg) as the sound designer. I made the dev and the visuals assets parts. Fonts are from Kenney Assets.

In this mix between a clicker and a music box, you will destroy your mouse to gain access to every music patterns. 

The game may come back with new versions and multiple new features, sounds ...
